author: daxian-dbw
body:
Related to #4357 

This PR includes following changes:
1. Remove FulLCLR related build script in `build.psm1`
1. Remove commented out FullCLR related scripts in `AppVeyor.psm1`
1. Remove FullCLR test file `test/fullclr/PowerShellGithubDev.Tests.ps1`
1. Remove workflow related code.
1. Remove workflow related modules (`PSWorkflow` and `PSWorkflowUtility`) from `Modules\windows-full`.

Note that folders `Modules\windows-full` and `Modules\windows-core-full` are kept because:
1. Some modules in it may still be ported to powershell core in future, such as `PSScheduledJob`
1. It's easy to compare and see which cmdlets are missing from powershell core.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: This PR affects too many files. I will split it up to several PRs.

title: Clean up FullCLR related build script and code
